channel.title: Docs on Queer Healing Resources
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Queer Healing Resources

item.title: San Francisco resources
item.description:
See also: SF LGBT Center Resources directory

Trauma-informed spiritual groups

SF Dharma Collective
SF Zen Center
GLIDE radically inclusive church
(there are many more)

Immersion Learning & Retreat Centers

1440 Multiversity - Santa Cruz
Esalen Institute — Big Sur holistic alternative retreat center
Spirit Rock — Marin Insight meditation center
Green Gulch Farm — Marin
Deer Park Monastery — Escondido, CA — Thich Nhat Hanh’s monestary in the US

HIV/AIDS Support

SF AIDS Foundation
The Shanti Project
Instituto Familiar de la Raza (Latino/Chicano AIDS Services)
Native American AIDS Project
Project Open Hands (meals & groceries for seniors)
USCF Alliance Health Project (peer support in San Francisco)
